optionalParameters.name: title
optionalParameters.description: Controls whether the media title is displayed

optionalParameters.name: poster
optionalParameters.description: Determines if the poster image is shown

optionalParameters.name: autoPlay
optionalParameters.description: Controls whether the media starts playing automatically

optionalParameters.name: startAt
optionalParameters.description: Starts the video at the specified time in seconds

optionalParameters.name: theme
optionalParameters.description: Changes the player's color (hex code format)

optionalParameters.name: server
optionalParameters.description: Changes the default server for the player (set to server name)

optionalParameters.name: hideServer
optionalParameters.description: Controls whether the server selector button is shown or hidden

optionalParameters.name: fullscreenButton
optionalParameters.description: Controls whether the fullscreen button is shown or hidden

optionalParameters.name: chromecast
optionalParameters.description: Controls whether the Chromecast button is shown or hidden

optionalParameters.name: sub
optionalParameters.description: Sets the default subtitle (e.g. en, es, fr)
